idea:
Employment generation

 EXPRESS DIESEL LLP is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter! When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel. This will helps to generate the employment opportunity and creates the job opportunity.
name: EXPRESS DIESEL LLP

idea:
The online buying preferences of consumers are changing considerably. The consumers nowadays prefer browsing online and making purchases for almost all basic commodities like grocery to luxury items like jewelry, cars, etc.
We Boozers Delivery Private Limited adhere to such trend of placing orders for goods using smartphones and other means of technology is picking up pace, research shows that consumers do not mind using technology to skip certain trips down the liquor store and ordering alcohol and other consumable liquids online.
name: BOOZERA DELIVERY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our aims to be the best jewellery line for the people young at heart. Our products will be made mostly in silver as it is a precious metal and can be easily reused and will also have a value in future. Our products will be not a expenditure for our customer but an investment.
name: T&A
